data.prayer: Father, help your children in Upper Demerara-Berbice, Guyana find someone like the Samaritan Woman today. Someone who will open an entire town to your message of salvation.
data.verse: So the woman left her water jar and went away into town and said to the people, 29 “Come, see a man who told me all that I ever did. Can this be the Christ?” They went out of the town and were coming to him.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Upper Demerara-Berbice, Guyana
data.section_summary: What people or activities could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Father, you desire the people in the state of Upper Demerara-Berbice who are far from you to hear about you.
data.verse: "Those who were not told about him will see, and those who have not heard will understand."

data.prayer: Lord, to the people of Upper Demerara-Berbice you say, "If you wait for Me, I will work on your behalf."
data.verse: For from of old men have not heard, nor perceived by the ear, neither has the eye seen a God besides you, who works for him who waits for him.

data.prayer: Jesus, you taught Paul to train Timothy to train faithful men who would train others. Please, teach the church of Upper Demerara-Berbice, Guyana to do the same.
data.verse: And the things you have heard me say in the presence of many witnesses entrust to reliable people who will also be qualified to teach others.

data.prayer: Lord, bring the blind by a way that they don’t know. Lead the Urdu people in paths that they don’t know. Make darkness light before them and crooked places straight. Do not forsake the Urdu people.
Lord, make the 6,286 believers in Upper Demerara-Berbice to be brave and clear with the gospel to their 33,715 neighbors.
data.verse: So Paul and Barnabas spent considerable time there, speaking boldly for the Lord, who confirmed the message of his grace by enabling them to perform signs and wonders.

data.prayer: Jesus, you are the great high priest, please make the 6,286 believers in Upper Demerara-Berbice, Guyana a worthy priesthood under you.
data.verse: Since then we have a great high priest who has passed through the heavens, Jesus, the Son of God, let us hold fast our confession.

data.section_summary:
the state of Upper Demerara-Berbice, Guyana has a population of 40,000.

We estimate Upper Demerara-Berbice has 6,286 people who might know Jesus, 14,290 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 19,425 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 6 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Lord, we pray for the believers in Upper Demerara-Berbice, Guyana to be more like Jesus in their love for friends and enemies.
data.verse: But I tell you, love your enemies and pray for those who persecute you.
